revised_title: Advances in Steel Development Based on Physical Metallurgy
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in steel development based on physical metallurgy, focusing on the relations between microstructure and properties. It covers topics such as grain size control, alloy design, and the effects of solutes on strength. The article also highlights the importance of understanding the mechanisms of ductile fracture and the role of inclusions and carbides in controlling steel properties.
